definition: to change clothes/to go to the toilet (euphemism)
more/even more/further/still/still more
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
clothes/CL:件[jian4]/Kangxi radical 145
to dress/to wear/to put on (clothes)
change room/dressing room/locker room/toilet

sentences.english: Whether there are problems in the dressing room over Ibra?
sentences.chinese: 伊佈會不會造成更衣室問題？

sentences.english: In the locker room I pull off my clothes and take a one-minute shower.
sentences.chinese: 我在更衣室脫下了衣服，衝了一分鐘澡。

sentences.english: That just shows the amount of characters in the dressing room at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 看看我們現在更衣室裏的各個狠角色吧。

sentences.english: Sparky was always quite quiet in the dressing room.
sentences.chinese: 休斯在更衣室總是很安靜。

sentences.english: Let me open the locker for you.
Afterwards, in the dressing room, Woody was despondent.
sentences.chinese: 後來有一次，伍迪沮喪的坐在更衣室裏。

sentences.english: The performers are changing their clothes in the changeroom.
sentences.chinese: 演員們正在更衣室換服裝。

sentences.english: E. g. I'd like to take these dresses into a fitting room and try them on.
sentences.chinese: 我想把這幾件洋裝拿到更衣間試穿一下。

sentences.english: How will he fit in the dressing room?
sentences.chinese: 加斯佩將會如何融入梅阿查的更衣室呢？

sentences.english: In addition, the utility model can also achieve the function of a clothes changing room by utilizing the combined design of the partition room.
sentences.chinese: 此外，利用其隔間的組合設計亦可達到更衣間的功能。

sentences.english: So tell us about life in the kit room at Carrington?
sentences.chinese: 那麼告訴我們關於卡靈頓更衣室的故事吧？

sentences.english: "I remembered my grandfather in the locker-room, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “我在更衣室裏想起了爺爺，”他說。

sentences.english: At gym, I took out my singlet from the bag.
sentences.chinese: 健身房更衣室裏，我把背心從揹包取出來。

sentences.english: Also he is an excellent team-mate for the dressing room.
sentences.chinese: 而且在更衣室裏他也是個出色的隊友。

sentences.english: Electric water heaters are installed near the changing and clothing rooms for supplying hot water for shower and washing.
sentences.chinese: 在更衣間旁設置電熱水器，爲淋浴和洗盥供應熱水。

definition: to make oneself presentable/to freshen up
to wash up/to freshen up
to rinse the mouth and wash the face
to wash the face and rinse the mouth
please take off your coat (honorific)/loose-fitting garment
to go to sleep/to go to bed (literary)
to attend to/to care for (patients etc)/to look after/to wait upon/to serve/also written 伏侍, see also 服事[fu2 shi4]
to defecate (euphemism)/to go to the toilet
to get dressed
to dine
to serve/to wait upon
to urinate/to empty one's bladder
inner room/bedroom
to undress
to purify one's body (i.e. to get castrated)
to get up/to leave/to set forth
